entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
